Are you ready to be thrown into an immersive high quality game full of hundreds of enemies who are just dying to munch upon your delectable brain? Take the fight to your enemy and employ dozens of weapons to fend off hordes of the undead.

A squad-based tactical shooter designed primarily for nonvisual play.

name: Swords and Sorcery: Sovereign
summary: Swords and Sorcery - Sovereign is the sequel to Underworld, a party-based, first person view role-playing game with turn-based combat and a square grid 3D environment. The art was made by a professional comics illustrator.

name: Sweet Bakery Tycoon: Extended Edition
summary: Start your baking career and prepare some delicious cakes for your clients, using a whole set of creams, fruits, and decorations. Test your skills on 60 diverse and increasingly difficult levels.

name: Sweet In the Mountains
summary: This is a casual work about farming and raising babies. You open your eyes, and not only are you in ancient times, but you're surrounded by two babies of unknown origin. In order to make a living, you started the story of farming, raising babies and getting rich, all by yourself.

name: Sweet Dream Succubus: Nightmare Edition
summary: Sweet Dream Succubus: Nightmare Edition is the remastered/updated version of an erotic interactive visual novel, created by a collaboration between well-known erotic artist Doxy and popular cosplayer and model, Swimsuit Succubus. The new version features additional content with updated and improved artwork.

name: Swallows: Spring in Bishkek
summary:
Swallows: Spring in Bishkek is a gaming app designed to stop girls and young women from being abducted and forced into a marriage, a practice known as bride-kidnapping, or ala-kachuu in Kyrgyz.

An interactive story - based on the real-life experiences of abducted women - the game guides users through a scenario where their choices shape the virtual outcome. The game begins when the main character sees her best friend kidnapped into marriage. The player then has to decide what to do next, aided by notes prepared by journalists, lawyers, human rights activists, and psychologists.

name: Sweetest Valentine
summary: Spend your Valentine's Day with the boy of your choosing... except there's blood involved.

name: Swords & Adventures
summary: Enter a fantastic world in search of fame and glory!

name: Sword: Depths of the Void
summary: Sword: Depths of the Void is WorthyWorm and The Sword Teams first upcoming game, releasing in 2025. Sword: Depths of the Void is a 2D Action RPG Platformer with a special sword that can morph it's blade into different weapons. Play as Trent Helms, the chosen one of this legendary sword, and make your way through various areas in open-world forms, bring people with you on your journey, explore a town in the sky, and much, much more.

name: Sword Islands
summary: Get reborn as an adventurer and master your blade in a VR experience designed with action and exploration in mind. Go solo or join your party, with up to 4 players co-op campaign.

name: Swirl W@tch
summary: Swirl W@​tch is a tense stealth-action roguelite that takes place on an over-exploited gas giant. Infiltrate industrial installations, evade or eliminate guard ships, commit corporate sabotage and grow the movement to unlock new gear. Can your actions free this otherworldly world?

name: Sword of Moonlight King's Field Making tool
summary: The user can make his own role-playing game using this 3D RPG making tool. It includes various useful tools to create a King's Field-like game. The remake of the original King's Field is also included as a customizable sample.

name: Swap
summary: Swap is a top-down shooter with unique gameplay mechanics, slow-motion and jump & run elements. Select between three energies to damage your enemies, be healed by them or to send them to hell with your RageFire. Use various weapons, abbilities, physics and slow-motion to fight in style.

name: Swarmcade
summary: Survive the relentless swarm in this arcade take on the 'bullet heaven' action roguelite. Slay 1000s of foes, level up, loot chests and make your character more powerful than ever. Unlock perma-upgrades and more heroes, so you can even the odds on future runs.

name: Swarmed: Nuts & Bolts
summary: In deep space, your robot transport vehicle crash-landed on a barren asteroid. The robots have escaped and are hungry for both revenge and crunchy humans. You are their only hope. Battle your way through multiple waves of rouge robots to avoid being SWARMED in this retro, heart pounding game.

name: Sweety Kitty
summary: It's a relaxing anime puzzle with cute kawaii girls. Solve puzzles, and enjoy high-quality artwork.

name: Swimming Pool Cleaner
summary: Swimming Pool Cleaner is a once-in-a-lifetime opportunity to become a one-person pool cleaning team. Take on rewarding tasks of cleaning pools and modifying them. Make them come to life and earn money while doing it!

name: Swords of Legends Online: Collector's Edition
summary: Deck out your mystical hero all in gold with the additional costume and opulent weapon skin. Or slip into an all-black ensemble and take to the shadows. You also get some fantastic wings, plus a set for expanding your residence with an enchanting garden.

name: Swords of Legends Online: Deluxe Edition
summary: Swords of Legends Online: Deluxe Edition includes exclusive extras! Deck out your mystical hero all in gold. You’ll radiate grace and command respect in the additional costume and luxurious weapon skin.

name: Sweet Half-Life
summary:
Sweet Half-Life is a single player science fiction and Manga-based Mod of Valve's first-person shooter Half-Life, set at a similar time to the original game and following a similar storyline. It is played through the eyes of Gordon McGinley, and follows his plight to escape from the crumbling Black Mesa Research Facility.

It includes 3 new weapons and 5 new enemies.

name: Swarm Grinder
summary: Swarm Grinder is an action roguelite hypercore game with pixel art graphics. Battle enemies to make your way through a mass of spreading cells hosting dormant enemies. Collect a variety of game-changing skills and upgrades to create unique builds.

name: Swamp Stomp
summary:
The Swamps of Pangea are full of fantastic fruits - the key to eternal life. But you are not alone in your quest to harvest these sweet treasures...
Go Bananas (and Pineapples!) with Swamp Stomp. As Fearless Frank you romp through the swamp collecting fruit. To thwart you in this task, the marauding Green Gobblers scour the swamp trying to knock you out and steel your bananas. You must climb Vine Ladders, jump across ravines, RIDE log lifts and navigate each level to WIN! Beware stompy the fearsome gorilla. He will stomp on your head given half a chance so watch out. Good luck!

name: Sweety Kitty 2
summary: It's a relaxing anime puzzle with cute kawaii girls. Solve puzzles, and enjoy high-quality artwork.

name: Sword of Wonder: It's Good to be a King
summary: Another visual novel from the creator of Romancing the Kingdom, Sword of Wonder: It's good to be a king, follows a merchant whose luck is about to become very bountiful. Very bountiful, indeed.

name: Sword Art Online: Last Recollection
summary:
Based on Sword Art Online’s War of Underworld anime arc, a new story unfolds with tough challenges that await our beloved hero, Kirito, and his new friends. Players will unmask the Dark Knight and find out if Kirito and the crew will survive the relentless battling against the forces of the Dark Territory!

It’s the perfect game to introduce during SAO’s 10th Anniversary, when everyone can reminisce about their favorite SAO memories while meeting their favorite character again.

The newest installment of the SWORD ART ONLINE video game series comes to next-gen consoles with a cast featuring characters from previous SAO anime.

SWORD ART ONLINE Last Recollection boasts a brand new, original storyline that explores what would have happened if Kirito, Eugeo, and their allies didn’t meet their tragic end in The War of the Underworld.

Experience an exciting and elevated battle system with your friends against familiar foes from the Sword Art Online series!

name: Sword of the Vagrant
summary:
Guide Vivian the Vagrant, through vibrant and dynamic landscapes while hacking and slashing a path from a quiet coastal village through mysterious forests, haunted castles, and wrecked battlegrounds. When the endless barrage of enemies have been vanquished, what solace will be left for our hero?
"Journey into a gorgeous hand-painted fantasy world known as Mythrilia and discover the truth about your bloodline and its darkest secret. Hack and slash a path from a quiet coastal village through mysterious forests, haunted castles, and wrecked battlegrounds. When the endless barrage of enemies have been vanquished, what solace will be left for our hero?

The Vagrant is a 2D action RPG. As Vivian, you will experience an exciting and challenging adventure focused on combat gameplay that utilizes combo chains, charge attacks, and special skills, all while improving your character's build through new equipment and abilities. Play casually or become a master combatant.

name: Swoon! Earth Escape
summary: The planet is flooded with a mysterious green acid. Help Swoon and the rest of the crew escape the Earth. Collect all the mechanical parts of your spaceship and face the most daring bosses in this epic retro-style journey!

name: Sweeping the World
summary: Sweeping the World is a mild rougelike game. The enemies come like a tide. You must survive and gain more powerful power! Combine the peerless power to stop all enemies! At the same time, use the spiritual stone obtained to refine yourself and become the most powerful immortal cultivator!

name: Sword&Magic
summary: Welcome to the magical continent of the Middle Ages full of magic and monsters! Everything you want will happen here! Just help the magicians touch the petrified seal and they will help you fight monsters!

name: Sweet Holiday Jigsaws: Trick or Treat
summary: The Jigsaw Master Maker has rescued us from a treatless Halloween. Hundreds of fun colorfull puzzles to brighten things up around here. Chose number of pieces from 30 to 1024. An unique function to add extra non-related pieces into the picture to be solved. Full of excitement.

name: Swampy
summary: A VMU game released with Evil Twin: Cyprien's Chronicles.
platforms: Visual Memory Unit / Visual Memory System

name: Sword of the Necromancer: Revenant
summary:
Sword of the Necromancer: Revenant is a third-person 3D Action RPG with Dungeon Crawler sections. Revive your enemies once again and make them fight alongside you!

With a completely renewed battle and companion system, travel the continent, restore the sacred city of Euda to its former glory and defeat the ominous threat that looms over the world.

Gather the powers of the Revenants, forgotten heroes of old times, create a little army of dead and defeat the Necromancer once and for all.

name: SWmud
summary:
Star Wars MUD, or SWmud, is a telnet text-based game set in the Star Wars universe, mostly during A New Hope to the Thrawn (Legends) campaign. Player killing is optional. Great space combat and newbie help!
Star Wars mud is a heavily modified LPmud based on the Star Wars Universe. SWmud is not a role-playing MUD, though role-playing is not forbidden as long as it is within the rules.

name: Sweet Dream
summary: Sweet Dream is an English fangame created for Dream Diary Jam 3. You play as Shurui Shian, a boy who is trying to find happiness through his dreams.

name: Sweet Sleep
summary:
With unending amounts of free time, Madotsuki finds herself with a lack of things to do. More often than not, she sleeps. While her dreams were surreal before, they were at least consistent. When her dreams begin to change she finds new turmoil in herself.

Sweet Sleep is a visual novel with branching paths. Features original artwork and music based on the original RPG Maker walking sim.

name: Sweet Bakery Tycoon: Premium Edition
summary: Start your baking career and prepare some delicious cakes for your clients, using a whole set of creams, fruits, and decorations.

name: Swords & Bones: Deluxe Edition
summary: The demon world invades humanity every 500 years. The Wolf Demon has been bullying the Kingdom of Vestus and it seems that there is no hope. But there’s one hero who can put an end to it - you - a nameless warrior with a sword in hand. What are you waiting for?

name: Switch Sides
summary: A infinite rolling adventure. Switch sides quickly to stop the ball rolling off the edge!

name: Swap.
summary: Swap. is a funny match-3 & erasing game.

name: Swipe That
summary:
Swipe, fill and win.
Swipe it is simple minimalist casual action puzzle game.
Swipe around but don't get blocked.
Skip block but don't get outside the grid.
Endless fun enjoy breath taking challenging levels.

name: Sword Art Online: Alicization Lycoris - Blooming of Forget-me-not
summary: Blooming of Forget-me-not is the first major expansion DLC for Sword Art Online Alicization Lycoris. Additional content includes a new story, weapons, outfits, and more.

name: Swoords: Friends Word Game
summary: SWOORDS is a free multiplayer word game, play in turn with your friends and challenge Doctor SWO.

name: Swipey Maze
summary:
Find the key to unlock the block and escape the maze!
Escape quickly, or master each labyrinth by collecting all 3 stars first!
Spend keys to unlock new trail effects!
Collect stars to prove your skills!

name: SwayBods
summary: Bubble monsters are sad and get delighted when they are swaying. Tap them to get them swaying! ... but then they dislike bumping into each other.

name: Swapologic
summary: Swapologic is a challenge you will enjoy. Your mission is to solve the logic puzzles in each row by swapping tiles. As you complete each puzzle, the row will be eliminated and you will score.

name: Switch the Track
summary: Switch the Track is a short puzzle game where you are in charge of a train track control panel. Your objective is to interact with the switches and signals in order to take the trains to their correct destination.

name: Swap Puzzles
summary:
Swap tiles to reveal beautiful images.
Relax with easy puzzles or challenge yourself with expert difficulty level.

name: Switchboard
summary: Spell, lock, adapt and outduel. Switchboard is a brand new word game that combines turn-based word play with a healthy dose of strategy and a little bit of luck.

name: Sweets Pusher Friends
summary: This is an online cooperative pusher game where you scoop sweets and get them by pushing them on the table and catching them in the box. Cooperate with other players to complete mini-games and win various prizes.

name: Sweet Solitaire: School Witch 3
summary: Any miracles are possible here, the world of magic lives by its own laws. Many interesting levels to pass on the way! The difficulty varies and is ideal for fans of the genre, and unique gold cards will make the game even more interesting.

name: Swarm Horror
summary: Swarm Horror is a survival horror game in which the player must progress while defeating insects. The goal of the game is to escape from the feeding ground of the insects you have wandered into. The insects call their friends to feed on you.

name: Swords & Bones 3
summary: The Swords & Bones saga reaches its third chapter! Inspired by past classics 2D action-platformer games, get ready to fight your way through more than 50 levels full of with enemies, traps and pitfalls. RPG elements enrich the gaming experience.

name: Swimming Poo
summary: Swimming Poo is a humorous action game that combines the arcade style of gameplay with the freedom of the sandbox world. It focuses on escaping from enemies, interacting with the world and fighting in its own unique way.

name: Swift Ride
summary:
Take a break and get yourself into a swift little ride...
Pass by as many cars as you can without crashing while your speed is gradually increasing. Achieve ranks for score boost,score as many points as you can and get yourself to the top of the Game Center leader-board to challenge your friends.

name: Sword of Destruction II: Kyouhen no Yakata
Swords & Bones: Ultimate Edition
summary: Grab the sword and defend the Kingdom of Vestus in an adventure full of action in the spirit of classic retro games. This bundle includes the Brave Skin DLC.

name: Swish Ball!
summary:
Get ready for the new basketball season in style! Swish Ball is a new and exciting take on the game that we all know and love.
Tap, hit, shoot, and swish before the 24s shot clock runs out. Challenge your friends for the big baller crown!

name: Swords & Bones: Extended Edition
summary: This bundle includes the Spooky Skin DLC.

name: Sweet Science: The Girls of Silversee Castle
summary: A visual novel that takes you back in time – to a chapter of your youth, long forgotten – to four quirky young women – to a castle full of science, mysteries and – perhaps – romance...This is the first large AI-generated VN.

name: Sweet Cafe
summary: Sweet Cafe is a special Voltage app that incorporates all the characters from the games. They contain special stories that are specific to the app and sometimes even crossovers between two or more games are included. However, not all of Voltage's games are included - dropped games are currently not included.

name: Swish
summary: Swish is a massively multiplayer online basketball game. Your goal is to make as many points as you can in global contests that last 1 minute. At the end of every game, the top 20 player are displayed.

name: Swiper
summary: A fun and challenging, memory testing, game for all ages. Easy to learn, and hard to master. Watch and listen and then repeat the pattern by swiping to complete each level. Keep track of high scores, and reach new heights.

name: Sword World PC
summary: Sword World PC is a role-playing game on PC-98, published on 1992. It is a game that aims to fully reproduce the system of the Sword World RPG, a table-talk RPG, on a computer.

name: Sweet Dreams Dahlia
summary: An epic 2D hand-drawn metroidvania game, where you explore, fight and survive an ancient mystery land. Dahlia wakes up from her sarcophagus cage without remembering much. She has to find her leading commander and get answers to why the kingdom is left in ruins.

name: Swing Racers
summary:
Swing Racers is a 3D racing game with unique controls - swing your car around the house with a rubber band - the further you pull, the faster you go but the harder it becomes!

Swing and fling your way through 15 tracks in your favourite household environments, including messy bedrooms, dinner tables, kitchen sinks, pool tables, gardens and more! Bonus levels included for some extra non-racing fun!

Burn your opponents with a fireball or freeze them and smash them to pieces! Zap them with lightning, or leave trails of sticky goo and slippery oil for them to drive into!

Unlock new cars and new rubber bands to enhance your speed and handling + cool paint jobs just for the looks!

name: Swap Machina
summary: Help PD the robot supervisor defrag the mainframe before it's too late in this fast-paced puzzle game made in the Pulp game engine. Inspired by classic 90's block-based action puzzlers Panel de Pon and Tetris Attack, arcade game fans are sure to enjoy Swap Machina. You can compete with your friends' high scores online and locally using the leaderboard feature.

name: Swords & Bones: Special Edition
summary: The demon world invades humanity every 500 years. The Wolf Demon has been bullying the Kingdom of Vestus and it seems that there is no hope. But there’s one hero who can put an end to it - you - a nameless warrior with a sword in hand. What are you waiting for?

name: Swim Meet
summary: See if you can beat the best in 5 Olympic-style Swimming Events. Use finger gestures that are modeled on the actual swimming motion used in each event.

name: Sweet Bakery Tycoon: Multiplayer Mode
summary:
Join forces with your friend in the ultimate cooking adventure with this new Multiplayer Mode!

This DLC features an exciting local multiplayer gameplay mode, allowing players to team up and play together. It adds a new layer of excitement and replayability to the game, while providing a fun and engaging experience for players to enjoy with friends and family.

name: Sweet Bakery Tycoon: Multiplayer Edition
summary:
Start your baking career and prepare some delicious cakes for your clients, using a whole set of creams, fruits, and decorations. Test your skills on 60 diverse and increasingly difficult levels. Personalize your interior with countless upgrades.

All of us have a magic place, where everyday troubles seem to disappear. Sweet Bakery Tycoon fulfills your fantasy of creating and managing a bakery of your dreams

name: Swipe: Maze solver
summary:
A new type of one hand playable maze game!
Touching colors and piano musics will get your eyes and ears.

name: Sword of the Spirit
summary: In this combat-focused RPG, you'll embark on a journey through perilous realms filled with dangerous creatures and challenging foes. Engage in fast-paced, strategic battles where every move counts as you wield a variety of weapons and master powerful abilities.

name: Sword Hero
summary: An immersive fantasy survival game A thrilling adventure A powerful flying sword A bunch of skills with different functions Kill all evil

name: Swipe Tennis
summary: Swipe Tennis is an immersive sports game that offers players an opportunity to test their mouse skills by becoming a tennis champion

name: Sword Smash
summary: Outline"Sword Smash" is an exhilarating TopDown 2D action game where you defeat many enemies and progress through the stages. The objective is to control the player and defeat numerous monsters and bosses.

name: Swords & Bones: Premium Edition
summary:
Grab the sword and defend the Kingdom of Vestus in an adventure full of action in the spirit of classic retro games.

The Premium Edition includes:
- Over 50 levels full of action
- 16-bit style visuals
- Power-ups to collect
- Cool bosses to defeat
- Atmospheric chiptune music
- Two endings to discover
- 2 DLCs: the Valor and the Spooky Skin.

name: Swarm Survivor
summary: A dark and moody top-down shooter. Unlock new weapons and upgrades by completing achievements, making each run different. Will you be able to escape the swarm?

name: Sweet Sins: Kawaii Run
summary:
Don’t be fooled by the utterly kawaii art style, Sweet Sins is an endless runner like you have never seen: it’s fast, it’s challenging, it’s evil and yup, it’s also extremely cute. If you’re looking for an old school arcade challenge, your search ends right here.
Sweet Sins is an original infinite runner where you lead Luna, Sandy, Rica, Nana, Red, Ivy and Moira on their journey! Very easy to play but hard to master!

name: Sword Collector
summary: This is an exhilarating 3D action RPG featuring huge boss battles.

name: Swing Fall
summary: Land on top of the buildings from above. Features the same character as Explore and Mr. Runner.

name: Swords & Bones: Definitive Edition
summary: Grab the sword and defend the Kingdom of Vestus in an adventure full of action in the spirit of classic retro games.

name: Swap
summary: Swap is a simple yet brutally difficult game that will frustrate and personally insult you. Hone your reflexes and steel your emotions to uncover an unexpected story... Or just give up now and save us all some time, the choice is yours.

name: Sweet Forest Guardian
summary: Sweet Forest Guardian－Is a card + real-time tactics game. Players have to combine their own decks to defeat the enemy, and after winning the battle, they can save their lovely elf companions.

name: Swingggggg
summary: Swingggggg is a 2D neon arcade game where you play as a pendulum and swing through endless levels using a unique physics-based mechanic.

name: Sweet Summer World Challenge
summary: Sweet Summer characters would like to welcome you to the one of the most adventurous towns! All the fun and excitement starts here! Make your way to the top of the map with “S” grade in each level and beat the world record!

name: Swords & Bones: Complete Edition
summary: Grab the sword and defend the Kingdom of Vestus in an adventure full of action in the spirit of classic retro games.

name: Swap: Mobile Edition
summary: A simple yet brutally difficult game that will undoubtedly frustrate and personally insult you. Uncover a story full of psychological manipulation and emotional warfare while banging your head against unfairly designed levels. Sound like fun? Great! Let's see how that optimism is doing for you in a few hours.

name: Sword of the Sea
summary:
Sword of the Sea is an action-adventure game developed by Giant Squid, the studio behind Abzû and The Pathless.

Set in a vast desert landscape, players control a character known as the Wraith, exploring ruins and uncovering a lost world. Movement is centered on the "Hoversword," a tool that combines surfing, skateboarding, and snowboarding mechanics. The game emphasizes fluid traversal, atmospheric exploration, and light puzzle-solving.

name: Sweet Dreams
summary: A short horror visual novel where you're starting to feel a bit sleepy on the train. Will you find friendship? Or will you find trouble...

name: SWAT Commander: Prologue
summary:
The FREE PROLOGUE version of our tactical squad shooter. In SWAT Commander you take charge of an elite special forces unit. Issue orders to your SWAT team, manage its members and their equipment, but most importantly – complete your mission successfully.

SWAT Commander: Prologue is the FREE prologue version of the upcoming team tactical shooter and does not reflect the final version of the game.

name: Swapshot
summary: In Swapshot, you take control of this fearless protagonist, equipped with an incredible teleportation gun. Your mission is to overcome a series of challenges in a world filled with 2D platforms and intriguing puzzles.

name: Switchblade: Epic Pack
summary:
The Switchblade Epic Pack includes the full game with additional 10 vehicles to own and use forever.

Fog Hog, Tiny Giant, Thunder Pulse, Berserker, Goofer, Electron, Gravitron
Kamikaze, Safeguard, Healing Hippo

name: Swipe Manager: Soccer 2018
summary:
Think you could do a better job than Gareth or Pep? Do you have what it takes to motivate teams of overpaid prima donnas while keeping your Chairman onside, stopping the fans from protesting outside your home, and the press from running that story about a donkey? Take the job of managing one of the league’s biggest clubs, or work your way up with a team of relegation strugglers - the choice is yours.
Whether it's dealing with terrible VAR decisions, players going rogue or greedy agents, Swipe Manager: Soccer 2018 is a ‘choose your own adventure’ game where you call the shots. Make all the key decisions via a card dragging mechanic – simply move the card left or right to see your choice of answers and then let go to select.
Each season promises to be filled with tough calls and nail biting football action where you call the shots and define the tactics. This is management like you've never experienced before! Unless you played Swipe Manager: Soccer last year...

name: SwapStar
summary: Make patterns to gain energy. Spend energy to do actions. Plan your actions carefully to destroy your opponent's grid before they do yours. Play as Swapster in Story Mode or as any of the 10 colorful cast of characters in Mission or Versus Mode.

name: Sweet Bakery Tycoon: Co-op Edition
summary:
Sweeten up your life!
Start your baking career and prepare some delicious cakes for your clients, using a whole set of creams, fruits, and decorations.

Test your skills on 60 diverse and increasingly difficult levels.

Personalize your interior with countless upgrades.

name: Swiggart's Last Will
summary: Swiggart's Last Will is the ultimate virtual escape experience. To escape the room, players will need to solve riddles, play games, and complete puzzles. Games and puzzles include a cipher, a slide puzzle, Sudoku with colored shapes, and a memory challenge. There is also a piano to practice on.

name: Sweepers Mine
summary: Sweepers Mine is a standard minesweeper game, featuring different difficulty modes: Classic, Easy, Medium, Expert, Custom.

name: Sweetcore Brews
summary: Sweetcore Brews is an otome about a tea-brewing witch called “Milly”, whose dream is to open her own magical tea shop in the city. She is currently an apprentice witch working at an existing magical tea shop where the shopkeeper is rarely around. So Milly manages the shop full-time, practicing daily her new magical teas on her own by using them as solutions for her customers’ lives. She meets two love interests – Zero and Kingsley, both are also magical humans who run their own unique businesses. This game is a slice of life romance where Milly deals with the funny mistakes she makes from her magical teas causing problems, and she falls in love with Zero or Kingsley over time.

name: Swordbird Song: The Iron Owl Tower
summary:
Follow the Bird Hero entering the lair of the Iron Owls in this short Action RPG game for Gameboy.

Bird Hero gets their journey interrupted when hit by a lightning bolt and falls on a remote island.

They learn the island is ruled by the Owl King, an evil ruler who enslaves the islanders, making them work in his tower.

Find your way into the Iron Owl Tower, defeat the Owl King and free the island from his evil!

name: Sweet Feets
summary: Sweet Feets is the simplest 2D puzzle the final goal of which to give you pleasure!

name: Switch Sides 2: Sea Sandwich
summary: The mercat is hungry! Guide him by switching sides to feed him those lovely sandwiches!

name: Swing Robot
summary: Tap to change direction and swing the robot,don't touch metal pieces.

name: Sword Art Online: Last Recollection - Ritual of Bonds: Vol. 1
summary: In Volume 1 you'll get: Strea, Philia, Sinon, Silica, Asuna, LIsbeth, Dorothy, Premiere and Tia.

name: Sword Art Online: Last Recollection - Ritual of Bonds: Vol. 2
summary: In Volume 2 you'll get Rain, Seven, Alice, Eugeo, Leafa, ???, Medina, Kureha and Zeliska.

name: Sweet No Death
summary: Sweet No Death is a short horror-themed RPG game. This game is dialogue-heavy and plays out more like a visual novel with light RPG elements.

name: Sweet Sort
summary: Sweet Sort: Color Sorting Game is happy to take you on board for the ultimate color sort adventure. Discover a theme color puzzle that’s easy to pick up and impossible to put down. Exercise your brain and grab your fork to take on an endless stream of sugary treats in cake games. It is like sorting games, but with chocolate and sugar powder. Let the good times sweeten with the new cake sort game.

name: Swipe 3
summary:
This is a unique and addictive game of match three to crush, Simple swipe on the screen to match 3 or more of the same color tiles and get as many points as possible.
Is so simple, try it soon!

name: Sweets Mania: Candy Sugar Rush Match 3 Games
summary: Craving something sweet? Get your daily dose of sweets with a new delicious game for candy lovers! Try out a totally new match 3 game adventure featuring juicy candy elements to combine and eliminate, exciting boosters and missions, amazing blast effects and incredibly tasty graphics!

name: Swan Song
summary: Swan Song is a traditional Yume Nikki fangame created for Dream Diary Jam 7 by scummbag.

name: Sword of Glory
summary: Live, fight, die, upgrade, repeat!

name: Sword & Spatula
summary: A cooperative game for two players where the players take on the role of a skilled cook and a fearless warrior. Together, you must defend against waves of enemies while preparing delicious meals to keep yourself satiated. Two players, one mission: Survive together!

name: Swimming Dynasty
summary: Take your mark... Go! Create up to 5 characters, upgrade your swimmers, recruit swimmers to improve your team and climb to the top division. Build your team from scratch and compete for the championship! Start your dynasty now!

name: Sword sand Shotguns
summary: Swords and Shotguns is a Sandbox Survival MMORPG, combining elements of PvE and full loot PvP with intense real-time combat. Gather resources, craft power gear, and shape the player-driven economy. The entire world is a massive big server.

name: Swimsuit Samurai
summary: This wonderful nude beach has been invaded by a horde of women in admittingly fashionable swimsuits, so it's up to a lone naked samurai to enforce the undress code!

name: SwarmsurgE
summary: Survive the Swarm of monsters Surging across the land, leaving destruction and chaos in their wake. Warriors with unique abilities and strengths can attempt to venture out alone to confront the raging swarms. But they will have to band together in order to survive and defeat the monstrous horde.

name: Sweety Girls
summary: Sweety Girls is an erotic visual novel in which you have to meet three enchanting beauties. Learn recipes for delicious desserts and choose the one you want to spend an evening alone with. Cook, seduce the girls and have fun!

name: Swift by Knight
summary: Swift by Knight is a 2D platformer that puts you in control of Jack, the Nimble Knight, on a quest for speed and precision. Bounce off enemies, grapple, and utilize the unique level mechanics to navigate with speed and finesse.

name: Sweet Girl Gurumelo
summary: Amanita is feeling down lately. She lost her best friend and she can't do anything about it. Could you listen to her story, and maybe help her out?

name: Sweety Sweets
summary: This game is a classic memory game with several levels of difficulty and beautiful arts.

name: Sweets and Swipes
summary:
Feed the Sweet Tooth! He’s upset without sweets!
Swipe the candies as fast as possible, and they’ll go directly into his mouth.
The more you feed him, the sooner you get new sweets!
Go to the factory and improve production to feed Sweet Tooth faster. And don’t forget to pamper him with delicacies and add fillers to earn more!

name: Swordash
summary: Get ready to defend your home against a horde of insane enemies in this epic adventure! A mysterious girl has returned, and it's up to you to stop the invasion. Show off your bravery and become the ultimate hero!

name: Swords and Sandals I: Gladiator
summary: Swords and Sandals Gladiator, are you ready to unleash hell in the arena?

name: Swollen to Bursting Until I am Disappearing on Purpose
summary: "Swollen to Bursting" is a weirdo RPG in which something is very wrong. A flying saucer has crash landed in town, but it's Thursday so you have to go to work at the post office.

name: Sweet Dreams
summary: Light hurt his eyes, use that to your advantage and keep him away. Learn the different points where the creature can enter to be prepared. Sound will give you clues to the creature's arrival. Keep your flashlight charged up. Every night the creature will try new ways to trap you.

name: Swordcar
summary: Swordcar is an automotive Car-achter action game with a healthy serving of gore. Slash and slice at 100 MPH and bathe in the blood of the mysterious busy corp.

name: Switch Dash Game
summary: Tap To Screen For Switch Color Dash. Go to the top, become the leader of the world ranking!

name: Sweeter Yesterday
summary:
You play as a young girl named Laletta, and go on a reminiscent adventure throughout her childhood world, coming across her imaginary friends along the way. Laletta's friends all have aspects of her personality intertwined in them, so when they start to become selfish and insincere, or vain and narcissistic... Laletta wonders if these bad traits are present in herself, too?

Follow Laletta on her journey of love, fear, and self-introspection.

name: Sweet Bakery Tycoon: Couch Co-op Edition
summary:
This bundle includes base game, Expansion Pack #2 and Multiplayer Mode with:

• 15 new levels and 7 new achievements
• local multiplayer gameplay mode, allowing players to team up and play together. It adds a new layer of excitement and replayability to the game, while providing a fun and engaging experience for players to enjoy with friends and family.

name: Swing 2 Heli
summary:
Tap to change direction and swing the 2 heli,don't touch metal pieces.
Play with your friend at the same time on the same device!
Sick and tired of not being able to play swing helicopter with your friends at the exact same time on the same device? Then worry no more !

name: Sword Chronicles: Awaken
summary: An mobile RPG of another story using the famous individuals from the Three Kingdoms era.

name: Sword of the Cat: Lost Hope
summary: A semi-open-world action RPG in a medieval-styled modern world. Fifty years after a great time disaster that killed most of mankind, two factions start looking for a way to restore the old world.

name: Swell
summary: Link #9 of Haunted PS1'S C.H.A.I.N. initially resembles a PSX disc, but is revealed in the research log to be some form of potentially living creature. What follows is only explainable on those terms.

name: Sword Drift
summary: Fly with your sword, roam the martial arts world!

name: Sweet Nightclub
summary: Sweet Nightclub is a casual card game. In this game, all charming girls hope to come to this nightclub for vacation and enjoy the unique massage service. Enjoy this sweet time with them!

name: Sweep It!
summary:
A Turn-Based Platform game.
As the player moves one step, the game time forwards one step.
As the game time rewinds one step, the player reverses the movement one step.

name: Sweet Neighbors
summary: "Sweet Neighbors" is a visual novel for adults only. The main character Ethan moves to a new neighborhood and becomes involved in a love triangle with young Ava and her mother Olivia. He faces a difficult choice - who to stay with and who to lose.

name: Swallow Nine Tails
summary: A game about the nature of dead things and the living and the still-dead languages of both for those who may be alive. But whom everyone else will see as dead or an animal.

name: Swipe Link
summary:
Swipe Link is a simple yet addictive puzzle game.
Strategically remove all linked blocks.

name: Swolemochao 1 & 2: Gym of the Year Edition
summary:
Ready to get swole? Swolemochao has a workout routine for you! But, it seems there's something odd about him, as if he's testing you more than training you. Find out the truth! Afterwards, find out what happened when Dr. Robotnik finds the fate of Swolemochao's mission. A depressed Player encounters Dr. Robotnik's newest scheme, the Mean Muscle Machine! Can you succeed with the perils that unfold?

Slapped together in a single package, Swolemochao 1 & 2: Gym of the Year Edition offers both games for you with remastered art and updated gameplay changes to improve upon the original 12 hour made first game, and extra bells and whistles for the not-made-in-12-hours sequel!

name: Swordeye
summary: A hardcore MMO slasher with brutal directional combat. Explore massive, persistent PvPvE dungeons where every fight matters. Fight your way to the top, or die trying.

name: Swapdown
summary:
Step into the pulsating world of Swapdown, where every second counts and your wits are tested to the limit! In this exhilarating "match three" extravaganza, players are given a thrilling 60 seconds to slide shapes in all directions - left, right, up, and down, with the goal of aligning the perfect trio of colors.

But that's not all! Feel the board has become too predictable? Hit the "Space Bar" and watch as Swapdown's dynamic arena reshuffles, throwing an array of fresh combinations your way. The clock is ticking, but if the pressure becomes too much, the trusty hint button awaits to give you that gentle nudge in the right direction.

Compete against friends or challenge yourself to beat your personal best. As the seconds dwindle, the pace intensifies, and the adrenaline soars. Only the sharpest eyes and quickest reflexes will emerge victorious with the highest score.

With vibrant visuals, an addictive soundtrack, and nail-biting gameplay, Swapdown guarantees a heart-racing experience from start to finish.

Are you geared up for a minute of mayhem? Dive into Swapdown, where the clock is your biggest rival, and glory awaits the swiftest swiper!

name: Swordplay: Karakuri - Strange Tale
summary: "Swordplay～Karakuri～Strange Tale" is a Japanese-style 3D action game set in a world where advanced "karakuri" technology is prevalent. Players can enjoy a slapstick drama in a world inspired by both "karakuri" mechanisms and the late Edo period.

name: Swipepi
summary: Minimalist and unique puzzle game

name: Sweet Season
summary: An adult visual novel released in 2002.

name: Sweet Season
summary: A port for PS2 and Dreamcast.

name: Swaplette
summary:
Do you like word games and want to try something new?
In Swaplette your task is to compose pairs of English words in which some letters are interchanged. Tap on the letters to swap their positions with letters of the same colour in the other word until both words are complete.
You can set the difficulty of the game by the number of letters in the words, and also whether the first letters in the words are fixed or not.
Swaplette is not only fun to play, but it also helps you improve your vocabulary.
If you want, you can compare your score with other players on a global leaderboard.
Enjoy is game!

name: Swords & Crystals
summary: Delve into a vast, magical medieval open world. This top-down MMORPG invites you to fight other players, battle epic bosses and to master various skills. Level up, complete quests, solve puzzles and gear up to attain glory and prestige by dominating leaderboards and earning achievements!

name: Sword Art Online: Last Recollection - Deluxe Edition
summary: The culmination of the Sword Art Online game series, Last Recollection features the largest roster of SAO playable characters and sub scenarios!

name: Sword Art Online: Last Recollection - Digital Premium Edition
Sweet Beauties
summary: This game is a classic memory game with several levels of difficulty and beautiful arts. Enjoy.

name: Swordfish
summary: An aquatic action game. Swim sword first into the deep to destroy the evil at the heart of the ocean.

name: SwapPics: Knights vs Demons
summary: Swap pictures of your kingdom around to complete your buildings. Direct the Knights and soldiers from your building to fight demons and capture middle kingdom.

name: Swords & Shields AdvBattleBoard
summary: A casual puzzle played with 4 sided chits with a swords or a shield on an edge played on a classic chess board. when chits clash they may rotate or capture the other, your objective is to capture the crown chits, there are 4 on both sides.

name: Sweet Town
summary: Sweet Town is a challenging roguelike top-down shooter where players, as a brave child, must save their town from an Evil Spirit's influence on Halloween night by defeating manipulated enemies and collecting candies to summon and defeat the spirit.

name: Sweet Dreams Alex: Full Moon Edition
summary: Fall peacefully into the dreamscape with Sweet Dreams Alex: Full Moon Edition, which combines the game and its soundtrack into a single wholesome bundle.

name: Swords and Hexes
summary: Swords & Hexes is a hex-based tabletop strategy game that seamlessly merges classic board games with base building and resource management.

name: Sword and Magic World
summary: Sword and Magic World is a free-to-play MMORPG that combines fast action combat and immersive adventures in an open-world experience powered by Game Verse.

name: Sword n' Dragons
summary: fantasy boss fight, arcade dynamic gameplay, roguelite vibes. breathtaking action in some epic combat against giant monsters all over the way !!

name: Sword Art Online: Last Recollection - Black Swordsman Swords Skins Set
summary: Obtain 5 Sword Weapon Skins for 1-handed sword type weapons in-game.

name: Sweet
summary: In Sweet, you play as Pike, a little animal who just wants to go home after work! Explore a collection of odd and dreamlike environments as you head to where you need to be. Encounter strange creatures and become friends with them during combat!

name: Swamp Castle
summary: Finally decided to release a second beta of this piece of crap map (gameplay wise) I'm not sure I'll ever finish it.

name: Swim! Sacabambaspis
summary: The ancient fish “Sacabambaspis” game! Easy to operate but difficult! Let's compete to see how far you can swim!

name: Swarmhunters
summary: Swarmhunters is a top-down arena action shooter. The war between human and bugs has become worse - Project Swarmhunters emerged at this situation. You play as the best space soldiers in the galaxy and your mission is to strike the hive and hunt down the Emperor, supreme commander of bugs.

name: Swappy World
summary: Simply two mechanics: swipe to move and tap to interact in an open-world survival crafting experience made through cards. Handle your energy tactically to survive as long as possible. Craft weapons, build your base and be prepared to explore a world full of secrets.

name: Swing Solver
summary: Swing Solver is a physics based action puzzle. Stab the wire and swing to bring the ball to the goal.

name: Sweet Home: Look and Find - Collector's Edition
summary: Immerse yourself in the comfort and tranquility of home as you relax and enjoy finding objects, solving puzzles, and conquering mini-games in this cozy and clever new hidden object game from Avi Games!

name: Swamp & Towne
summary: A medium sized, dark and hostile swamp, and a large medieval town with a few custom textures. The second map centers on the cult of Koth.

name: Swole Mole
summary: A difficult boss rush & beat'em up with tight controls and carefully crafted levels made entirely with traditionally drawn animation on paper. This fair but tough souls like will test you skills against the most wild and creative bosses you've seen

name: Sweet Skullvivors
summary: Unleash the power of Mexican food to survive the hordes of hungry Alebrijes. Make the most colorful and delicious Ofrenda the world has ever seen.

name: Sweet Flip
summary: Honey, please turn over the cards and see which girl you like, or you want them all.

name: Swarm 2
summary:
With epic new environments, intoxicating rogue-like progression, and globally competitive leaderboards - this is what VR is really made for!
As Marv, the last surviving grapple commando, you’ll use your trusty pistol and grappling hook to battle back the Swarm and save Earth - with style! - while growing stronger and unraveling more of the story with each unique mission to the surface.

name: Sweet Time
summary: "Sweet Time" is a restaurant simulation management game, players need to play the role of a debt-ridden protagonist to run a restaurant and pay off debts, in a year's time, you can expand the restaurant, renovate the layout and recruit employees, a variety of side plots and endings, you start.

name: Swing By
summary: Spin you ship around planets and collect as many valuable prizes as possible

name: Swelldone
summary: Swelldone is a multiplayer simulation game for virtual paddling and rowing in an open world with realistic wave models. In Arcade Mode, you can paddle or row real world venues on a variety of watercrafts. Get stoked surfing big swells to rack up points on the leaderboard and race against other players and NPCs!

name: Sword Dance
summary: The Chinese style new era game "Sword Dance" is hot! Cute riders take flight to explore the immortal realm, enjoying the thrill of loving clouds and mist. Adventures in cultivating immortality, wielding swords to walk across the world, come and enjoy this exciting time of cultivating immortality!

name: Sweat! The Decathlon Game
summary: Sweat! is an unreleased game that was to be Starpath's version of Activision's Decathlon for the Supercharger cassette-based peripheral add-on. Given the fact that the Supercharger allowed for more memory and larger games, Sweat! probably would have been an amazing game had it been completed. Of course this never happened as the video game market was crumbling rapidly and people weren't spending money on regular video games, much less games that required special hardware. It was around this time that the financially troubled Starpath merged with Epyx. Most of Starpath's programmers transferred over to Epyx and used Sweat!'s game concept to create Summer Games.

name: Sword of Justice
summary: Sword of Justice is an Open world game, famous for its exquisite and delicate picture quality, real and vivid Jianghu atmosphere, subversion of traditional MMO techniques, and intelligent Al's profound impact on the game world. It is known as the "breathing Jianghu".

name: Sweet Flowers and Salt
summary:
Accompany the hardworking Salt as she looks after a beautiful garden. A cute healing type of game that's as sweet as Salt herself.

Grow flowers with Salt, harvest and collect in your collection box to level up, and reach the 99th level for your wish for happiness to be granted.

name: Swingers
summary: Swing your partner round and round!

name: Sweets Drop
summary: Drop and merge sweets into bigger ones but do not touch the red line!

name: Swarm
summary:
SWARM is a fast-paced one-button game.

You are getting rushed by minions everywhere. You collect points by bombing them. The more you get in a single explosion, the more points you'll get.

If a minion touches you, it's game over, so be fast!

name: Sword of Jade: Parallel Dreams
summary:
An RPG made in OHRRPGCE.

After his fall from grace from the group that calls themselves "Protectors", Dogero questions his role in society. Ready to accept defeat, he is confronted by a long lost friend, who inspires him to keep his dreams alive.

name: Sword and Fairy: Together Forever - Deluxe Edition
Swashbuckler's Xmas
summary: An action-packed holiday adventure full of pirates, snowballs, and the occasional yeti. Explore the North Pole in this third-person action adventure game for all ages.

name: Sweet Agents
summary: This game is a classic puzzle game with several levels of difficulty and beautiful arts.

name: Sword Art Online: Fractured Daydream
summary: In this online co-op action game, enter a distorted version of the SWORD ART ONLINE world. Pick your role in the form of favorite SWORD ART ONLINE characters and team up with 20 players for raids to defeat powerful enemies.

name: Swordfight Story
summary: Samurai 3 DMMO action game.

name: Sword of the King: The Classic of Mountains and Seas
summary: This is an action adventure game set in the context of Chinese classical mythology. The game incorporates a unique mechanism of sword flight, allowing players to freely soar in the air. Players need to master various sword techniques, attack accurately, and move flexibly to defeat enemies.

name: Sword Fight
summary: "Sword Fight" is a card battle game based on the martial arts world. Players can play as a mysterious knight in the arena and team up with other players for 3v3 confrontation.

name: Sweets Inc
summary: Create a confectionery empire in Sweets Inc, the business management simulation game where you take the helm of your very own sweets manufacturing company. Design delectable treats, build and manage your factories, and market your products across the continent to become an industry tycoon!

name: SwordSpin: Arena of Blades
summary: SwordSpin is a indie game in the casual genre that combines different aspects of game design, such as strategy, creativity but still retains its casualty. Players will play as a character that wields a warrior who is using a spinning sword, and his task is to fight mobs to survive in the arena.

name: Swordhaven: Iron Conspiracy
summary: Swordhaven is a classic party-based RPG. Explore the land of Nova Drakonia, embark on quests unique to your character, discover mysterious artefacts of the ancients, and unravel a hidden conspiracy that threatens the very existence of the world.

name: Sword of the Necromancer: Resurrection
summary: Help Tama to save Koko using the powers of the forbidden Sword of the Necromancer. Turn your foes into allies and reach the depths of the Necromancer's dungeon. Gain enough power to bring Koko back from the dead, no matter the cost. Now in 3D and with a renewed battle system!

name: Sword Smash 2
summary: 【Overview】"Sword Smash 2" is an exhilarating top-down 2D action game with added features from its predecessor, Sword Smash. Various stages feature a diverse range of monsters, and defeating the boss in each stage leads to game completion.

name: Swamp Up
summary: Jump between mushrooms, collect power-ups and break records while exploring your own path through a procedurally loaded map in this innovative endless runner with no lane limitations. Be fast, precise, and skillful to avoid all of its dangers. And most importantly, never touch the water.

name: Sworn
summary: Sworn is a 1-4 player co-op action rogue-like. Explore and reclaim a fallen Camelot from the reign of a corrupted Arthur and his Knights of the round table.

name: SwayBods: Physics Puzzle Game
summary: In this physics puzzle game, tap the bubble monsters to move them in a pendulum like swaying movement along the arc. Time the taps carefully so that the monsters do not bump into each other. Get all the monsters in a level swinging to complete the level.

name: Sword Princess Sistina
summary: Since a young age, Sistina has been lauded as the Sword Princess thanks to her masterful bladework. When the Demon God is accidentally unleashed, those skills are put to the test as she faces unstoppable adversaries!

name: Sword vs. Horde
summary: A melee based horde survival game. You are a knight wielding an oversized greatsword. Whirl it around in circles and use your blade's momentum to slash through endless hordes of monsters. But take care! You'll get dizzy from all the spinning!

name: Sweet Hell
summary: Your brother has taken over your throne. Reclaim it by defeating his eight legendary monster guardians.

name: Swarm Fortress
summary: Build walls, turrets and summon allies to survive hordes of enemies in this top-down sandbox base builder.

name: Swordsman
summary: This is a casual game with action gameplay designed to be highly consistent with the name

name: Swords & Bones 4
summary: The fourth installment of Swords & Bones immerses you in a new fantasy adventure, with pixel art in a side-scrolling action-platformer style. In this latest chapter, harness the power of magic to emerge victorious!

name: Sweet Bitter
summary: "Sweet Bitter" is a visual novel for adults only. A young boy named Phoenix, fleeing a painful past, finds himself a neighbor of two mysterious women: seductive Charlotte and her turbulent daughter Kira.

name: Swing Into Zero-G
summary: Fast-paced multiplayer racing game set in the vastness of space. Compete against friends or online rivals in intense races, where quick reflexes and strategic use of diverse skills determine the victor. Embrace the challenge of swinging your way to victory in this exhilarating space-themed race!

name: Sword and Shield Idle
summary: Enter a never-ending idle game. Battle creatures, rescue captives, forge swords, wield shields, and get special boosts. Each restart makes you tougher. Easy to play, deep in strategy.

name: Sweetsdigger
summary:
Lovely 68000 classic digging and shooting! 20 quick stages influenced by Jeff Minter's Gridrunner & ZUN's Highly Responsive to Prayers.

After the latest incident, Momoyo's new employer has her making plans for tonight! Dig up some sweets to bring to Megumu.

name: Swords & Crystals: Dragon Hatchling Pet
summary: You gain your personal Dragon Hatchling Pet which will follow you around in the game. The pet is an item that will automatilly be recovered upon losing. You can unlock but also dismiss the pet by simply clicking on the item.

name: Sweet Elite
summary:
Flirt and Uncover the Secrets of the Academy. The story and your relationships are shaped by your choices! The way you play is up to you!

Sweet Elite is an online visual novel where you play as scholarship student at Arlington Academy, a prestigious high school only accessible to the best teenagers in their respective fields worldwide.

name: Sweet Blend
summary:
Ever wanted to have your very own mutual pining, friends-to-lovers coffee shop romance, complete with a best friend to gush about your feelings to?

Then you're in luck!

Meet Avery Mercier, your only solace in the pit of despair that is a 9-5 office job...

And your longtime crush.

Experience the embarrassment/joy of finally making a move to ask him out on a date (or not, whatever floats your boat) and getting to know him better over a nice, casual cup of coffee.

Who knows, maybe it'll lead to something much deeper? ;)

name: Swordsman on the Eternal Journey
summary:
Let's go on a journey to break the lewd demonization curse placed on the main character, Mr. Swordsman.

A swordsman who was a soldier in the royal capital on the northern continent, but was cursed by the "Demon Lord," a powerful demon, to become a lewd demon. During his wandering journey, he received a blessing from the spirit of the fountain and was able to control the curse to some extent. In order to completely break the curse, he sets out on a journey.

name: Switch! Love Over Flowers
summary: Ever since your mother fell ill, you’ve spent your days working at a flower shop to pay her bills. Your life is simple, but you find it fulfilling, until one day, a customer comes in who turns your life upside down.

name: Swiper's Big Adventure
summary: Baby Fox lost his way and Swiper has volunteered to take him home. With help from Dora, Boots, and you, Swiper will fulfill his kind quest. But you'll have to be very careful because crows, spiders and bats are around and they will try to slow him down.

name: Sweet Love Bite
summary: Hidden behind a smokescreen of petty crime, the shadow council of vampires pulls the strings of governments and businesses worldwide. Despite their constant infighting, their influence has been strong enough to change the course of history, forcing society to conform to their will.

name: Sweetest Monster
summary: A middle-aged man has an encounter with a cute catgirl in the dead of night - but all is not as it seems.

name: Swipe Right or Left Geography Binary Quiz
summary:
Northern or Southern Hemisphere?
Swipe to Decide in This Binary Geography Quiz!

name: Swiped! Double Shots of Love
summary:
"Swiped!: Double Shots of Love" is a romantic visual novel featuring a slightly older cast of 4 main love interests. You can customise your MC's name and pronouns.

This game features cussing, I'd usually recommend for a slightly older audience due to the cast of dateables.

name: Sword Lake
summary: "Sword Lake" is a national style survival Rogue, class survivor game. There are no superfluous skills here, only swords, please feel free to build your unsurpassed sword

name: Switch Range
summary: Step into the heart-pounding world of Switch Range, where you become the last line of defense against relentless robot onslaughts. Arm yourself with an arsenal of weapons, each meticulously crafted with realistic projectile dynamics, demanding strategic thinking and surgical precision to survive.

name: Swing Scale
summary: Swing Scale is a game that uses centrifugal force to explore various worlds and aim upward. Adjust the length of the wire, adjust the speed, and push the limits.

name: Swingmania
summary: Swingmania is a Virtual Reality rhythm game where you slice the notes!

name: Sword Warriors
summary: “Sword Warriors” is a MMOARPG mobile game, a perfect blend of classic role-playing and the new open world gameplay, which create a massive storyline, expressed with visually stunning graphic! Brave the world with alliance, or even meet the love of your life in the world of “Sword Warriors”!

name: Swapmeat
summary: Frenetic roguelite meat 'em up action! Rip through alien worlds solo or co-op, harvest mutant body parts to wield their powers, and fulfill your delicious destiny.

name: Sweet Forest
summary: Sweet Forest - is a simple and beautiful jigsaw puzzle game with relaxing music accompaniment. After completing the level, you can enjoy the girl's photo in the gallery.

name: Swarmsign
summary: Protect your small off world farm from a variety of oversized and hungry alien bugs. Gain access to a varied assortment of weaponry and equipment designed for high caliber pest control. Bring a friend or two for added firepower.

name: Sword and Plow
summary:
An RPG mixed with a gardening game!

Can a farmer slay an evil dragon?
Grow and eat your food to gain strength
Drag items with the left mouse button.
Use and equip items in your inventory with a right click. Drag seeds onto the farm plot squares to either side of your inventory to grow crops.

name: Swampify
summary: A top-down puzzle game where you place hexagon tiles to build a river and restore a swamp ecosystem

name: Sweet Office 2
summary: Sweet Office 2 - is a simple and beautiful jigsaw puzzle game with relaxing music accompaniment. After completing the level, you can enjoy the girl's photo in the gallery.

name: Switch Race
summary: Switch your vehicle, match your environment!

name: SWAT
summary: Aliens try to build a tunnel from their vessel to your home base to infiltrate you. Your task is to prevent them from doing so.

name: Sword Art Online: Fractured Daydream - Deluxe Edition
summary: The Deluxe Edition includes SWORD ART ONLINE Fractured Daydream, Character Pass Vol.1, and the Prism Heart Costume Set.

name: Sword Art Online: Fractured Daydream - Premium Edition
summary: The Premium Edition includes SWORD ART ONLINE Fractured Daydream, Character Pass Vol.1, Prism Heart Costume Set, Digital Artbook & Soundtrack App, and Wild Joker Dress.

name: Swamped!
summary: Discover a Tower Defense as cute as it is addictive. Collect funny hats, magical equipment, and special powers to create the ultimate defense build. Explore an enchanted world filled with charming characters and challenges to overcome!

name: Sword & Seek
summary: Sword and Seek is a cozy fantasy hidden object game set in a medieval world, where players embark on a journey to receive the blessing of the goddesses to become adventurers.

name: Swordia
summary: Traverse Swordia, a community-driven MMORPG with skill-based progression, PVP, PVE, and endless possibilities. Inspired by the classics, experience a mix of dungeon crawling, farming, mining, and more. Help development with your choices and feedback.

name: SwingHard
summary: A Dark Fantasy Boss Rush game that will give you a real workout. Swing Hard to do damage. Parry by accurately aiming your weapon. Dodge by moving your body. Squat To Move options for those with limited space. Swing hard, move often, you'll need to exercise your mind and body to win.

name: Swing Game
summary: A silly game about swinging!

name: Sweet Home
summary: "Sweet Home" has been transformed into a roguelite game.Pick two weapons and set their unique skills.Take down the monsters consumed by desire and liberate 'Cha Hyun Soo'.As a fan of the original, you'll find a richer experience in "Sweet Home".

name: Swamp Hunter
summary: Swamp Hunter, A Creature Slayer Extraction Looter game utilizing the latest features of Unreal Engine 5. Pushing the boundaries of of political satire and hilarious social commentary to deliver a game that is almost as crazy as our real life world.

name: Sword and Hammer: Hand of the King
summary: The reign is in chaos, choose between Sigfried the Sword of the king and Gregor the hammer of the king, live an epic adventure fighting against thieves, rebel knights and a dark cult leaded by a lich. Real actors lend their faces and skills to this fantasy adventure you will not easy forget, can you survive or will you die fighting for the king?

name: Sword Art Online: Lost Song - Limited Edition
summary: A limited edition for the PS Vita version of Lost Sont, it contains a special box, special Blu-ray disc, soundtrack CD, special booklet, and 12 clear posters.

name: Swords of Freeport
summary:
Swords of Freeport is a text-mode social RPG heavily inspired by the style of Bulletin Board System door games from back in the '90s. It is part MUD and part BBS Game (without the need for a BBS). You can play it on your home machine alone, or play/install it on an internet-accessible machine where others can join you.

It is heavily inspired by games such as Legend of the Red Dragon, with a certain numbers of turns per day. Select a profession, join a guild, and make a name for yourself.

name: Sweet Hazard
summary:
Airdropped into a ruined city and surrounded by a zombie horde, you will fight an endless battle against the living dead.

Sweet Hazard is a top-down, run-and-gun shooter that challenges you to survive against impossible odds. Master your weaponry, steel your nerves, and never take your eyes off the dead – and you'll survive for as long as your skills hold out.

name: Sweave
summary: Sweave is a hyper-casual game that showcases African culture through unique patterns, weaves, and symbols.

name: Swing Fling
summary: Swing high enough to fling the bird past the the start line three times to win the game.

name: Swan Song
summary: Swan Song is a cozy and emotional puzzle game where music guides your journey. Use notes of different shapes and sizes to program a music box and solve each puzzle. Help the swan reach the exit as you uncover a touching story of family, loss and grief.

name: Sword Art Online: Unleash Blading
summary:
Sword Art Online Unleash Blading was a mobile game based on the Sword Art Online Alicization saga.
It was originale called "Alicization Blading" in Japan and "Alicization Rising Steel" worldwide, but it was renamed in 2021.

The game closed on January 16, 2023.

name: Sweet Coffee Shop

Sharpen your blade, sword master! Dive into the world of action games where every slice is a masterpiece of power and precision. Sword Play is not just a game; it’s a duel of fate and glory set against a backdrop of breathtaking landscapes and mysterious enemies.

Welcome to Sword Play! - a marriage of cutting games and action games, a universe where each slash is a testament to the skills of the kunai master. With no need for internet, relish in the challenges of games with no wifi and embark on an epic ninja journey that knows no bounds!

Dash through numerous challenging levels, a perfect mix of slicing games and fighting games, where every enemy defeated is another step closer to becoming the ultimate slice master. With no wifi games feature, the adventure never stops; it only becomes more intense.

Feel the thrill of the sword fight, where ninja slice maneuvers and swift katana strikes rule the battlefield. Face hordes of assassins, ragdoll ninja warriors, and master the arts of ninja game strategies amidst the heat of the battle.

Swap is a game that will make you fall in love with it from the first "meow", with its exciting gameplay, picturesque and varied locations, interesting puzzles, adventurous spirit, as well as a fluffy and cute main character. The game will become your new and ideal way to spend time with interest.

name: Sword Art Online Eron
summary:
SAOE – The True Sword Art Online Experience

SAOE is an MMORPG inspired by the Sword Art Online anime universe, where the goal is clear: complete the 100 floors of a gigantic tower, each filled with unique challenges, monsters and adventures.

In SAOE, you don’t live the story of the anime characters — here, you are the protagonist of your own journey. Starting at level 1, your path will be shaped by the choices you make: which skills you will master, which attributes you will strengthen, and which strategy you will use to overcome the dangers that await on each new floor.

With continuous evolution, challenging combats and the freedom to create your own fighting style, SAOE offers an intense and personalized experience. Get ready to test your limits, make allies and prove your worth on a journey where each victory brings you closer to the top... and each mistake can cost you dearly.

The challenge is on. How far can you go?

name: Swipe Stream
summary: The game revolves around a mysterious book, De Vermis Mysteriis. What is this book? Why do people want it so badly? How are your dreams connected to it? Is it real, or just a fantasy? So, many questions - can you find out the answers?

name: Sword Dancer: Kyoujin no Megami
summary:
Goddess of the Evil Blade is a direct sequel to the first Sword Dancer. The story continues to chronicle the adventures of the "sword dancer" Hien and his mentor, the warrior Tetsuta. They have succeeded in rescuing the "white dragon sorceress" Setsuna from the clutches of the demons. However, greater challenges await the three. Setsuna's life might be in danger, and the watchful eye of the evil Black Dragon continues to follow the heroes. The adherents of the benevolent White Dragon have to prepare for the decisive battle against the forces of evil...

The game plays very similarly to its predecessor. The overall structure corresponds to that of a traditional Japanese RPG: the player navigates the heroes through top-down environments, buying supplies in town, advancing the narrative in a linear way, and fighting enemies to gain experience and level up automatically. Like in the first game, the battles are action sequences that take place in small side-scrolling areas, similarly to fighting games. However, unlike in the predecessor, the enemies are visibly walking on the screen.

The fighting game element is more developed in the second game; two additional modes (beside the main story mode) are accessible from the main menu: "monster attack" and "vs. mode". Monster attack mode allows the player to select one of the game's heroes and fight increasingly stronger monsters; "vs. mode" features two-player competition.

name: Swamp Fellas
summary: Swamp Fellas is a cozy multiplayer game up to 8 players where frogs fish, vibe, and cause mild chaos. Explore a chill island, talk with friends via proximity chat with a reactive character, and mess around with weird props in a third space made for silly fun moments.

name: Swarm Hunter
summary:
1985. An Alternate Universe. A Forgotten World Calls for Help.

The International Space Agency (ISA) has just intercepted a desperate, system-wide distress signal from the long-isolated inhabitants of Pluto. In a race against time, the nearby vessel Empress of Discovery is dispatched to respond…but moments after making orbit, the ship’s final transmission crackles through the void: a garbled, static-soaked mayday… then silence.

Now, all eyes turn to you.

Assume the role of Master Commander Lance Johnson, captain of the legendary Gilded Seeker.

Your mission: investigate the Plutonian distress call, uncover the fate of the Empress and its crew, and confront whatever terror has awakened on the planet’s surface. Can you stop the unknown menace before it spreads beyond Pluto’s orbit?

name: Swimpossible!

Dive into Sweet Beach Holidays, the ultimate adult puzzle game where relaxation meets romance! Join three unique and stunning 3D girls on a tropical island getaway and experience a vacation filled with sun, sand, and sweet surprises.

As you progress through 18 challenging card levels, unlock tantalizing rewards including 36 real-time, adult CG scenes. Each girl has her own distinct personality and desires, rewarding you for your attention.

summary: Swift Striders Parkour is a parkour game using unreal engine 5 latest technologies it has freeruning, vaults, tic tac, flips, climbing and more, there are also multiple maps to play so you wont get bored. There are multiple characters to chose from.
