summary: Sweet Sport - A simple and beautiful jigsaw puzzle game with sports as the theme. It features five beautiful and cute girls' daily life after sports, accompanied by relaxing music. After completing the level, you can enjoy the girls' photos in the gallery.

name: Switch Box
summary: "Switch Box" is a 2D pixel-art puzzle platformer. In an unfamiliar world, you must interact with the environment and utilize tools to solve challenges, overcome obstacles, and ultimately discover the path back home.

name: Sweet Hamster Days
summary: "I got reincarnated... as a hamster! My owners are three sisters: a charming cosplayer, a straight-laced and caring one, and one with a sharp tongue and a sweet side. I'm being showered in love... but who will I fall in love with?"

name: Swarmdustry
summary: Build a living factory and automate the Swarm. Harvest resources, build mega factories and evolve organic industry. Balance growth, efficiency, creep spread, and survival in a world that fights back. Or doesn't. Up to you really.

name: Sweet Pool
summary: Sweet Pool - A simple and beautiful jigsaw puzzle game with a swimming pool as the theme. It features the daily life of five cute girls in swimsuits, accompanied by relaxing music. After completing the level, you can enjoy the girls' photos in the gallery.

name: Swim
summary: Enter the world of Block Blast, where you have to use your brain with every step, and you can also watch the magic cube explode, which is super rewarding!

name: Sweet Dungeon
summary: A simple and beautiful puzzle game with a dungeon theme. It tells the daily life of five slave girls in the dungeon, accompanied by relaxing music. After completing the level, you can enjoy the girls' photos in the gallery.

name: Sweet Idol
summary: Sweet Idol - A simple and beautiful jigsaw puzzle game with idols as the theme. It features the daily lives of five idol girls with different identities, accompanied by relaxing music. After completing the level, you can enjoy the girls' photos in the gallery.

name: Sweet Model
summary: Sweet Model - A simple and beautiful jigsaw puzzle game with models as the theme. It features the daily lives of five cute model girls, accompanied by relaxing music. After completing the levels, you can enjoy the girls' photos in the gallery.

name: Sweet Story Neko
summary:
Two forest cats live in the deep forest. The singing of birds, the sound of wind and water, became their home. You can be a part of their romantic friendship, so join them.

Sweet Story Neko is a puzzle game in which you must collect all pairs of pictures to reproduce the image.

name: Swords and Souls Neverseen
summary: From SoulGame Studio, creators of the wildly popular Swords & Souls, comes an all new, even bigger standalone adventure to an island far across the sea. In Swords & Souls: Neverseen you find yourself shipwrecked and caught up in a struggle between a dangerous witch and some decidedly kooky townsfolk. To stop the witch, you'll need to train, fight, train, and fight some more in this addictive single-player combat-focused game that rewards player skill and juicy progression.

name: Sweet Driver
summary: Sweet Driver - A simple and beautiful jigsaw puzzle game with drivers as the theme. It features the daily life of five pretty and cute girls at work, accompanied by relaxing music. After completing the level, you can enjoy the girls' photos in the gallery.

name: Sword World VR
summary: Colosseum Mode: 1vN battles vs hordes. VR lets you sword-strike weak points or blunt-stun/knockback. Motion skills add immersion: slash/jab to trigger. Loot gear to boost stats and alter combat—weapons change attacks . Gear up and slash through crowds in this fast VR brawler.

name: Sweet Nibbles
summary: Fight possessed souls, solve deadly puzzles, and master movement abilities like wall running to infiltrate a sinister factory built to control everyone. Survive the sweet world of Mr. Shrine’s candy empire in this action-horror adventure. Uncover dark secrets, meet mysterious characters, and gods.

name: Swordmancy
summary:
Swordmancy is a survivor game where the player controls a Swordmancer, warriors capables of controlling living weapon.

You defeat enemies, get the experience and choose one out of three random upgrade as you level up. Once you get an upgrade to level 8, you can evolve the weapon to get an even more powerful version.

As you defeat bosses, complete events and evolve weapons, you will unlock more characters, weapons and upgrades. You can try every single one of them and unlock more and more elements in your collection!

name: Sweet Easter
summary: Sweet Easter - A simple and beautiful puzzle game with Easter theme, where five cute resurrected bunny girls work, accompanied by relaxing music, and after completing the level you can enjoy the girls' photos in the gallery.

name: Swap
summary: In SWAP, players navigate through complex puzzles using the Swap gun to switch places with monoliths, trip pressure plates, open doors, and pass through force fields.

name: Swords & Earrings: Tales of Andaria
summary:
Swords & Earrings: Tales of Andaria is a cellphone game inspired by Fire Emblem. For years this was the only Fire Emblem style strategy game on Android phones.

Swords & Earrings (Sw&Ear) is a turn-based strategy game settled in a medieval fantasy world (RPG). Sw&Ear is targeted at an audience that prefers a deep,
challenging, and addictive game play.

name: Switchboard
summary: 1952, Empire Grand. Inhabit the frantic life of a telephone exchange operator in this thrilling voice-acted historical puzzle game. Connect calls, consult the directories and listen closely to earn your family a better life. When agents of war and rebellion begin to call your name, will you answer?

name: Swords and Sandals III Redux
summary: A legend returns! The beloved classic Swords and Sandals 3 is back, re-forged in glory! Step back into the Gladiae Ultratus once more and prepare to take on the greatest gladiators in all Brandor. It's the hardest, most metal gladiator game ever made.

name: Swarm Me
summary: A minimalist horde survival arena where you can’t shoot back. You’re hunted by an endless swarm of drones - kite the horde, bait them into deadly traps, upgrade your defenses, and survive as long as you can. Every minute the swarm grows denser, faster, and deadlier.

name: Sweetoria Land
summary: Sweetoria Land is a 3D low-poly platformer for kids 8-15. Jump, collect Candy Keys, solve puzzles, and explore a vibrant candy kingdom with a heartfelt story of growth, joy, and overcoming challenges!

name: Sword Sage: Awakening
summary: Sword Sage: Awakening is an action RPG rooted in Chinese myth and folklore. You play as San Niang, a novice disciple of the Yuangong Sect, about to confront the thousand-year inherited burden by the leaking of the forbidden celestial books, and the many ominous forces lurking in the shadows...

name: Sword of Rule
summary: Sword of Rule is a hardcore RTS battleground built for competitive players. Master the delicate balance between four critical resources (Wheat, Iron, Clay, Wood) and Gold, and maintain continuous troop training through effective resource management and raiding. Victory is defined by deep Tribal Specialization: choose Romans for absolute offensive power, Greeks for unyielding defense, or Arabs/Germans for raiding efficiency and attrition warfare. The game culminates in the massive, coordinated Wonder War, where your alliance must synchronize army movements and manage logistics 24/7 to defend the core monument to Level 100. Success demands quantitative analysis of unit stats, strategic deployment of powerful Heroes and Artifacts, and flawless coordination. Only superior strategy and alliance teamwork dictate who raises the Sword of Rule.

name: Sweetie Candy Maze: Yellow Lemon
summary: Dive into a vibrant candy world! Collect delicious sweets and find your way through playful yellow lemon mazes in this sweet and colorful adventure.

name: Sweep Strike
summary: Face off against explosive critters in this cartoony roguelike where every battle unfolds on Minesweeper grids! Reveal tiles to strike and avoid enemy traps, build your inventory to evolve your strategy, and push your luck through intense runs packed with chaotic surprises.

name: Sweet Shop
summary: Sweet Shop - A simple and aesthetically pleasing puzzle game set in a sweet toy shop. It depicts the daily lives of five beautiful and adorable toy girls, accompanied by relaxing music. After completing a level, you can view their photos in the gallery.

name: Sweepminer
summary: A collection of bite-sized Minesweeper-inspired games. Relax, click around, and enjoy some lighthearted spins on a classic.

name: Sweet Starlight Sisters
summary: “Sweet Starlight Sisters” is a character-raising romance adventure where you share a sweet life under one roof with the bunny-girl sisters Anya and Sanya. Train the duo with your own hands to become top performers, and—while occasionally fielding their heart-pounding advances—lead them to victory.

name: Sweetie Candy Maze: Purple Grape
summary: Dive into a vibrant candy world! Collect delicious sweets and find your way through playful purple grape mazes in this sweet and colorful adventure.

name: Sweet Succubus
summary: Sweet Succubus is an adult visual novel game. Your life changes when Lily, a sweet but possessive succubus, arrives in a mysterious package. As love and danger unfold, build relationships with charming heroines and confront a rival succubus. Will you choose passion or true love?

name: Sweet Succubus Home
summary: A recently laid-off musician picks up a girl on the street—turns out she's a succubus!? To make ends meet, they start streaming music together. Rhythm game meets visual novel in a sweet and spicy cohabitation with your new demon roommate!

name: Sweeper
summary: Wager. Sweep. Spend. Repeat. The Minesweeper Grid-building Roguelike is here.

name: Sword of Ten Thousand Blades
summary: "Sword of Ten Thousand Blades" is a solo-developed martial arts idle single-player game presented in portrait mode. Focused on stunning combat effects, the game’s core idle mechanic lies in the process of item acquisition—every idle moment is dedicated to that breathtaking burst of damage in battle.

name: Swampwalker
summary: One-screen puzzle game

name: Sweet Math
summary: Sweet Math is a puzzle game in which the player faces mathematical challenges stuffed with fun in a world made of candy. Controlling a gummy bear, the player will jump in candy blocks and avoid obstacles, traps, enemies as well as paths of no return while trying to complete equations. The game includes several levels based on addition, subtraction, multiplication, division and numerical sequence. As the player progresses, the difficulty of the puzzles and equations increases. Perfect for those who want to learn while having fun!

name: SwitchTrack
summary: SwitchTrack is a coordination puzzle game about switches, levers and minecarts. Time your inputs correctly to guide as many minecarts through each level as possible.

name: Sweet Vampire
summary: Sweet Vampire - A simple and beautiful jigsaw puzzle game with vampires as the theme. It shows the daily life of five beautiful and cute vampire girls in the castle, accompanied by relaxing music. After completing the level, you can enjoy the girls' photos in the gallery.

name: Sword Slash Adventure
summary: Battle monsters in this storybook-inspired action game.

name: Swordformer
summary: Only two buttons for ultimate action: move and pick perks. Slash hordes, craft insane builds, and unleash wild weapons. Help Josh The Barbarian escape the Shadow Wizard Gang's video game prison!

name: Sword Legacy: Omen - Digital Deluxe Edition
summary:
Expand the Sword Legacy: Omen experience with the Digital Deluxe Edition!

It includes the epic soundtrack and a 70+ page digital story & art book full of insights into the development of the distinct art style, lore and animation of Sword Legacy. Get access to digital posters of Uther, the full party and a printable map of Broken Britannia whilst listening to 10 dramatic tracks by composer Bettina Calmon.

The "Story & Art Book" pdf text is available ONLY in English.

name: Sweep Squad
summary: Sweep Squad is a 1-4 player arcade sweep-em-up where you and your ambiguous rodent friends team up to sweep away the bad guys and hit your quotas. Crank up the earnings with overtime and use various sub-weapons at your disposal to sweep away the competition.

name: Sword of Shandar
summary: Sword of Shandar is a narrative-driven light RPG focused on choice, consequence, and discovery. Engage in turn-based combat, resolve challenges through dice-roll skill checks, crack locks in hands-on minigames, and decipher ancient runes as you uncover the secrets of a fading world.

name: Sweet Casino 2
summary: Sweet Casino 2 - A simple, aesthetically pleasing puzzle game set in a casino setting. It depicts the daily work lives of five beautiful and lovely casino employees, accompanied by relaxing music. After completing a level, you can view their photos in the gallery.

name: Sweet Cafe
summary: Sweet Cafe - A simple, aesthetically pleasing puzzle game set in a cafe, featuring the daily lives of five beautiful waitresses, accompanied by relaxing music. After completing a level, you can view their photos in the gallery.

name: Sweet Homegirl
summary: Sweet Homegirl - A simple, aesthetically pleasing puzzle game about homegirls. It features the daily lives of five beautiful and adorable homegirls, accompanied by relaxing music. After completing a level, you can view their photos in the gallery.

name: Swim Meet
summary: There's nothing better than swimming with a variety of women. Work hard and play hard with these beautiful swimmers to ensure the best of endings together as you compete for a place on the team.

summary: Step into a cozy world of hidden object fun, heartwarming stories, and the joy of creating your perfect home.
